instructions_to_main_agent: 2. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to 'index.css' at the very top.
3. TAILWIND: Update 'tailwind.config.js' with the colors and font families defined above.
4. LAYOUT: Use the 'container_padding' class for all main page wrappers to ensure consistent margins.
5. COMPONENTS: When using Shadcn components, override the default 'rounded-md' with 'rounded-sm' or 'rounded-none' to match the 'Ethereal Luxury' aesthetic.
6. DASHBOARD: For the provider dashboard, use the 'High Density Grid' strategy but keep the visual style light and airy using white cards with subtle borders.
7. IMAGES: Use the provided Unsplash URLs. DO NOT use placeholders.
8. TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': Do not use generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Micro-interactions: Add hover states to every button and card.
Whitespace: If you think there is enough whitespace, double it.
Contrast: Ensure text is legible against the light background. Use #1C1917 for main text, not #000000.
